description: Returns information about a snapshot of application state data.

parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of an existing application.

parameters.name: SnapshotName
parameters.description: The identifier of an application snapshot. You can retrieve this value using .

nested_items.name: SnapshotDetails
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the application snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotName
nested_items.description: The identifier for the application snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the application snapshot.

nested_items.name: ApplicationVersionId
nested_items.description: The current application version ID when the snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the application snapshot.

nested_items.name: RuntimeEnvironment
nested_items.description: The Flink Runtime for the application snapshot.
